Q_DESC:
Pattern matching in c: C programming code to check if a given string is present in another string, For example the string programming is present in c programming. 

If the string is present then it's location (i.e. at which position it is present) is printed. We create a function match which receives two character pointers and return the position if matching occurs otherwise returns -1. 

We are implementing naive string search algorithm in our c program
